Package xgf.main

Class Model

java.lang.Object
xgf.main.Model
public class Model extends Object
Class to manage information returned by the Controller and operate over files and folders
Version:
1.0
Author:
Xavi

    • showMatchInDirectory

      public void showMatchInDirectory(JPanel contentPane, JTextField textToFindInDirectory, JCheckBox checkCase, JCheckBox checkAccent, JCheckBox checkReplace, JTextField textToReplaceInDirectory)
      Show the number of found text inside a directory path
      Parameters:
      contentPane - Main panel to anchor the rest of the content
      textToFindInDirectory - Text to find inside a given directory path
      checkCase - Check to take case letters into account
      checkAccent - Check to take letters with accent into account
      checkReplace - Check to take into account if text should be replaced or only found
      textToReplaceInDirectory - Text to replace found text with

    • getMatchInDirectory

      private String getMatchInDirectory(File directory, String text, String textToReplaceWith) throws IOException
      Return the number of replaced text in a given directory path
      Parameters:
      directory - Directory to look for matches
      text - Text to look for
      textToReplaceWith - Text that replaces the original
      Returns:
      String Text that indicates the number of replaced text
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception in case it cannot create a file with the replaced text

    • getNumberOfMatchesAndReplace

      private int getNumberOfMatchesAndReplace(File directory, File file, String text, String textToReplaceWith) throws IOException
      Get the number of matches and generate a file with the changed text
      Parameters:
      directory - Directory to create the new file
      file - File to get the text from
      text - Original text to look for
      textToReplaceWith - Text that replaces the original
      Returns:
      integer Number of matches
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception in case it cannot create a file with the replaced text
